## Lectura


```{r lectura, include=FALSE}
df <- readr::read_csv("../Spotify_Youtube.csv")

df2 <- readr::read_csv("../genres_v2.csv")

df2$Uri <- df2$uri
df2
df2 <- df2 %>% select("Uri","genre","mode","time_signature","type")


df3 <- merge(df, df2, by = c("Uri"))


df <- df3
```
